Her eyes are open wide, reflecting complex, swirling blue and green light originating from an unseen cranial interface device near her temples. audio_desc: [Speaker] Mara (Internal Monologue/Whisper): Interface online... connection stable. [Sound Effect] A high-frequency whine building rapidly.
